==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こ|つつ|k2=づつ|o2=み|yomi=kun}}

===Alternative forms===
* [[小包み]]

===Etymology===
From [[小]] (''ko'', "small," "little") + [[包]] (''tsutsumi'', nominative form of [[包む]], "wrap," "pack")

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|こづつみ|y=k|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こづつみ}}

# [[parcel]], [[package]]

===Derived terms===
* [[書留小包]] (''kakitome kozutsumi''): registered parcel
* [[郵便小包]] (''yūbin kozutsumi''): parcel
